message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save even more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save more, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to save more, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell it to you for $115.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $118.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $112?
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $112. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $119.
I understand your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $115?
